display.title: Acquire: modern_industrialization:diesel_generator
description: Diesel generators will only use fuel when it needs to.
Various fuels can be burned in the Diesel Generator, and you can check in REI how many EU each fuel produces.
The Diesel Generator will produce up to 128 EU/t and will only connect to MV cables.
Diesel Generators will only use fuel when they need to, but if you need a constant supply of energy, you can put liquid fuels in the Large Steam Boiler instead of items.
A fully heated Large Steam Boiler will roughly produce twice the amount of energy a Diesel Generator would produce using the same quantity of fuel.

subtitle.text: Diesel generators will only use fuel when it needs to.
